description: Apple TV Aerial Screensaver — enhanced 4K catalog with descriptions and categories
format: HEVC 4K HDR in .mov container (remux to .mp4 for Samsung TVs)

categories.space: Earth from the International Space Station

videos.label: Alaskan Jellies
videos.description: A second colony of Alaskan moon jellies drifts through inky water, translucent bells catching ambient light

videos.label: Sea Stars
videos.description: Vibrant orange and purple sea stars cling to rocky tidal pools beneath swaying kelp canopy

videos.label: Bumpheads
videos.description: Massive bumphead parrotfish cruise over a coral reef in Bora Bora, crunching coral as they go

videos.label: Jacks
videos.description: Thousands of silver jacks swirl in a mesmerizing bait ball in Bora Bora's turquoise lagoon

videos.label: Barracuda
videos.description: A dense school of barracuda spirals through turquoise waters off Bora Bora

videos.label: Costa Rica Dolphins
videos.description: Pods of dolphins leap and play in the warm, rich waters off Costa Rica's Pacific coast

videos.label: California Dolphins
videos.description: Playful dolphins weave through towering California kelp forests in dappled sunlight

videos.label: Gray Reef Sharks
videos.description: Gray reef sharks patrol a coral-encrusted wall in the tropical Pacific with effortless grace

videos.label: Grand Canyon
videos.description: Aerial flight through the Grand Canyon reveals deep red and orange rock layers carved by millennia

videos.label: Grand Canyon
videos.description: Morning mist fills the Grand Canyon as the camera sweeps majestically along the South Rim

videos.label: Grand Canyon
videos.description: The Colorado River snakes as a thin ribbon through the vast Grand Canyon floor far below

videos.label: Grand Canyon
videos.description: Dramatic shadows play across Grand Canyon buttes and mesas at golden hour

videos.label: Grand Canyon
videos.description: A sweeping sunrise illuminates the Grand Canyon's ancient layered rock formations in warm hues

videos.label: Hong Kong
videos.description: The Star Ferry crosses Victoria Harbour as Hong Kong's legendary skyline blazes with neon light

videos.label: Iceland
videos.description: Snow-capped Icelandic peaks emerge from a sea of clouds in a majestic aerial sweep

videos.description: Volcanic landscapes and glacial rivers of Iceland stretch out in a breathtaking aerial panorama

videos.label: Iceland
videos.description: Steaming geothermal pools create surreal contrasts against Iceland's icy volcanic landscapes

videos.label: Iceland
videos.description: Black sand beaches and turquoise glacial waters meet along Iceland's wild southern coast

videos.label: Iceland
videos.description: Dramatic waterfalls cascade down dark Icelandic basalt cliffs into misty green valleys

videos.label: Iceland
videos.description: The otherworldly highland terrain of Iceland glows in the ethereal light of the midnight sun

videos.description: Giant kelp sways rhythmically in cold Pacific currents off the Monterey coast

videos.description: Graceful cownose rays glide in perfect formation through sun-dappled shallow waters

videos.description: Patagonian steppe gives way to turquoise glacial lakes and snow-capped Andean mountains

videos.description: Wind-swept plains beneath the dramatic granite towers of Patagonia's Torres del Paine

videos.label: Patagonia
videos.description: Icy blue glaciers flow slowly down Patagonian valleys toward pristine southern fjords

videos.description: Millions of golden jellies pulsate through Palau's famous Jellyfish Lake in warm light

videos.description: A dense cloud of golden jellyfish fills the frame in Palau's unique marine lakes

videos.description: Vibrant coral formations teem with tropical fish in Palau's pristine reef system

videos.description: Golden jellies drift peacefully through jade-green water dappled with tropical sunlight

videos.description: Colorful coral gardens and tropical fish thrive in the warm, crystal-clear Red Sea

videos.description: Dramatic Scottish coastline where dark cliffs meet the churning grey North Sea

videos.description: Rolling green hills and ancient castles of the Scottish countryside unfold from above

videos.description: Bridalveil Fall and Cathedral Rocks create a dramatic granite frame for Yosemite Valley

videos.description: El Capitan and Half Dome catch the first golden light of day in Yosemite Valley

videos.description: Morning mist swirls through Yosemite Valley as sheer granite walls rise on both sides

videos.description: Sunset paints the granite walls of Yosemite in warm shades of orange, amber, and gold

videos.description: Snow blankets Yosemite's high country, Tenaya Lake frozen in the shadow of Half Dome

videos.description: The Merced River winds peacefully through Yosemite Valley beneath ancient giant sequoias

videos.description: A cinematic aerial pass over San Francisco from Twin Peaks to the gleaming Bay Bridge

videos.description: The ISS traces a path from the dark Atlantic toward the brilliantly lit coastlines of Spain and France

videos.description: The San Francisco waterfront stretches from the Embarcadero to Fisherman's Wharf

videos.description: San Francisco at night — the Bay Bridge lit in white against the dark waters of the bay

videos.description: Fog rolls dramatically through the Golden Gate as San Francisco's skyline glows at dusk

videos.description: The ISS passes from the golden Sahara across the Mediterranean toward Italy's glowing coast

videos.description: San Francisco's grid of streets cascades down steep hills to the sparkling bay below

videos.description: The Golden Gate Bridge emerges from iconic fog as the camera sweeps over San Francisco Bay

videos.label: San Francisco
videos.description: San Francisco's painted ladies and downtown skyline bask in warm afternoon Pacific light

videos.description: The Nile Delta fans out in vivid green against the vast Egyptian desert, viewed from orbit

videos.description: Night lights of Iran and Afghanistan sparkle from the ISS, mountain ranges casting dark shadows below

videos.description: Orbital pass sweeping from the African coast across the Middle East, city clusters glowing in the darkness

videos.description: Lush green Caribbean islands dot a sapphire sea, viewed from orbit in brilliant daytime light

videos.description: The pristine coastline, mountains, and waters of New Zealand unfold below the ISS orbit

videos.description: A second orbital perspective reveals the Caribbean archipelago stretching across turquoise waters

videos.description: The Baja California peninsula and Southern California coast gleam golden from orbit

videos.description: The ISS traces a sweeping path from South Africa northward across the illuminated cities of Asia

videos.description: A serene Chinese valley unfolds below, with mist clinging to distant mountain peaks

videos.description: Terraced rice paddies cascade down Chinese mountain slopes in warm golden light

videos.description: The Burj Khalifa towers above Dubai's grid of illuminated streets and highways at night

videos.label: Greenland
videos.description: Massive icebergs calve into bright blue fjords along Greenland's rugged western coast

videos.description: Greenland's vast ice sheet stretches to the horizon, deep crevasses glowing blue in the Arctic sun

videos.description: Autumn tundra and glacial valleys create a vivid mosaic of color across Greenland's coast

videos.description: City lights of Korea and Japan brilliantly outline the coastlines in a stunning night ISS pass

videos.description: Australia's city lights outline the continent's coast as the ISS passes overhead at night

videos.description: The Southern Lights dance in luminous green curtains over Antarctica, filmed from the International Space Station

videos.description: New York at night from the ISS — the metropolitan area blazes as an island of light

videos.description: Sunlit Caribbean islands and coral reefs create a mosaic of blue and green in this daytime ISS pass

videos.description: Green and purple aurora borealis ripple magnificently over North America from the ISS

videos.label: China
videos.description: City lights of eastern China glow beneath the ISS in a nighttime orbital pass

videos.description: A nighttime orbital pass from the boot of Italy across the Middle East and onward to Asia

videos.description: The ISS crosses from emerald Ireland eastward toward Asia, European cities glowing below

videos.description: Lush green Hawaiian valleys slope gently down to pristine white sand beaches below

videos.description: Dense tower blocks of Hong Kong step up lush green hillsides at magical twilight hour

videos.description: Moon jellies pulse through the dark, cold waters of Alaska in a hypnotic underwater ballet
